title: patch ideas? have your say.
body:
ill just list off a few things off about characters and gameplay that i think needs to be added and id love if anyone can upvote and add to this because the more opinions that are added to this discussion the more chance it will be heard and actually taken into account with the next patch.

flipping the screen: ive discussed this once before about how this could help summoners who are more used to one side and i still think this would be  a good idea

debuffing runes/masteries/items/spells/summoner spells: it doesnt sound quite nice at first but this could add another layer to your gameplay in different ways. would you gamble out stats and abilities for a more diverse playstyle or would you stick to what you know.

variation summoner spells: this could be something simple like instead of just heal you could get dire heal where the cooldown would go faster the lower your hp is. others could include augments for the character and it could act as a passive.

variation champion spells: i understand alot of summoners will personally hate the idea but if you were able to customise a characters kit to suit your play style instead of just maximiseing what that character is already good at. this could actually change the entire game for the better.

marking ward: this ward would give no sight and would be invisible, its primary purpose would be too stick to the closest enemy for a short amount of time revealing them on the map 

Azir: why dont they add a sand circle around him to show his effective attack range.

i think thats all i have to say so i would greatly appreciate it if i could hear your ideas on this or what are somethings you want added?

replies.body: sounds like someone's been playing too much Heroes of the storm

1. sounds like a lot of work. wouldn't hold my breath. They only recently made it on PBE that you can change the colour you are, so that you are always blue and the enemy is always red no matter what side of the map your on.

2. you mean like exhaust and stuff? Items/spells that add debuffs to enemy rather than buffing yourself?

 I guess, but Exhaust is like a all-in-one debuff. Reduces damage, slows and increases your own damage. Also, they added that red smite which is like a debuff, so yeah. They seem to be going down this path.

3. i agree summoner spells to a touch up. Buffing heal has a HUGE impact on the game though (in terms of Assassins becoming useless) so its touchy subject. 

 When they buffed heal it became the choice over barrier. I mean, summoner spells are just like "meta" changes. I remember when the ADC used to take ignite because it was important for them to make sure to get the kill.
What I think would change the game a lot would be a nerf to flash cooldown. However, it would probably mean that champions without a dash or require a flash to be "viable" would be even less popular.

4. OP. Having an invisible tracker on a player that follows them. I mean, if it only lasted like 10 seconds but cost the same as a ward, then maybe.

5. no one has a circle around them to show their "effective" attack range
